Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2009 02:23AM jennies wrote: You should get a second opinion about the lump. You should also have a lab workup like blood count, mammo, ultrasound and biopsy to make sure that it is malignant or benign. Depending on the result of the biopsy, you may choose to leave the mass or have it removed. Lumpectomy is usually an ambulatory procedure, meaning, you will only need to remain in the hospital or surgical center a few hours after the operation.Â  Lumpectomy
